title: How to Wake Up Cyrus in Animal Crossing: New Leaf

steps.headline: Sell 100,000 bells worth of items to Reese.
steps.description:
One of the quickest ways to sell 100,000 bells worth of items to Reese is by selling her identified fossils. Another great way is by catching rare bugs on the island at nighttime, and bringing them back to sell at Re-Tail. You can sell almost anything to Reese over at Re-Tail. In order to do so, enter Re-Tail and talk to Reese by pressing “A.”
Choose the option “I want to sell!” then select the items that you wish to sell by tapping on them. Hit “Confirm” located in the lower right-hand side of the window, and Reese will then tell you how much she’s willing to pay; to complete the sale choose “deal!”
Ore is worth a lot of money. You can obtain these from rocks around your town. Gold nuggets are worth 4,000 bells each. Silver nuggets are worth 3,000 bells each. Emeralds, rubies, sapphires and amethysts are all worth 2,000 bells each.

steps.headline: Have 100 pieces of furniture in your catalog.
steps.description: The catalog in Animal Crossing: New Leaf keeps track of how many items you have obtained at one point or another in the game. The catalog is located in the Nooklings' store T&T Mart. This prerequisite does not require that you have 100 items of furniture on your person at one time, merely that you have obtained 100 unique pieces of furniture at some point throughout the game. Therefore, if you got a kiddie couch from a villager as a reward and immediately sold it, it would be recorded in your catalog and count towards this goal. Even picking up an item from the ground and putting it down straight after will add it to your catalog. You can obtain free furniture in many different ways.

steps.headline: Have 50 pieces of clothing in your catalog.
steps.description: This works the same way as the step above. You need to have come across 50 unique kinds of clothing throughout the game in order to fulfill this requirement. You can get clothes at the Able Sisters shop or Kicks.

steps.headline: Play the game for at least seven days.
steps.description: You will likely fulfill this requirement while attempting to fill the others, but just in case you zoom through the above steps, make sure it has been seven days since you started your Animal Crossing game. You can time travel if you want to get through this process faster.

steps.headline: Speak to him everyday.
steps.description: Every single time you play, walk up to Cyrus and go through a dialogue where Reese shouts at you. Repeat until he wakes up.

text:
Sell 100,000 bells worth of items to Reese. One of the quickest ways to sell 100,000 bells worth of items to Reese is by selling her identified fossils. Another great way is by catching rare bugs on the island at nighttime, and bringing them back to sell at Re-Tail. You can sell almost anything to Reese over at Re-Tail. In order to do so, enter Re-Tail and talk to Reese by pressing “A.”
Choose the option “I want to sell!” then select the items that you wish to sell by tapping on them. Hit “Confirm” located in the lower right-hand side of the window, and Reese will then tell you how much she’s willing to pay; to complete the sale choose “deal!”
Ore is worth a lot of money. You can obtain these from rocks around your town. Gold nuggets are worth 4,000 bells each. Silver nuggets are worth 3,000 bells each. Emeralds, rubies, sapphires and amethysts are all worth 2,000 bells each. Have 100 pieces of furniture in your catalog. The catalog in Animal Crossing: New Leaf keeps track of how many items you have obtained at one point or another in the game. The catalog is located in the Nooklings' store T&T Mart. This prerequisite does not require that you have 100 items of furniture on your person at one time, merely that you have obtained 100 unique pieces of furniture at some point throughout the game. Therefore, if you got a kiddie couch from a villager as a reward and immediately sold it, it would be recorded in your catalog and count towards this goal. Even picking up an item from the ground and putting it down straight after will add it to your catalog. You can obtain free furniture in many different ways. Have 50 pieces of clothing in your catalog. This works the same way as the step above. You need to have come across 50 unique kinds of clothing throughout the game in order to fulfill this requirement. You can get clothes at the Able Sisters shop or Kicks. Play the game for at least seven days. You will likely fulfill this requirement while attempting to fill the others, but just in case you zoom through the above steps, make sure it has been seven days since you started your Animal Crossing game. You can time travel if you want to get through this process faster. Speak to him everyday. Every single time you play, walk up to Cyrus and go through a dialogue where Reese shouts at you. Repeat until he wakes up.
